title: BusHub - Bus Tracking and Seat Booking App
description: Developed a Flutter app for real-time bus tracking and seat booking. Integrated Firebase for backend services, enabling user authentication, live seat updates, and notifications.

title: JETSET GO - Flight Allocation Web App
description: Built a web app to streamline communication between pilots and engineers, improving flight allocation efficiency and web browser compatibility.

title: MartChat - Supermarket Chatbot
description: Created a Python-based chatbot using Flask to assist supermarket customers in finding items and generating shopping lists. Integrated NLP and PDF generation for real-time item location prediction and list creation.
